statements: SELECT * FROM trader_profiles WHERE trader_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM trader_profiles WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT trader_id, preferences FROM trader_profiles ORDER BY trader_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM trader_profiles WHERE preferences->>'subscription' = 'gold';
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles ORDER BY first_name DESC, last_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT trader_id, first_name, last_name FROM trader_profiles WHERE trader_id > 100 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT trader_id, email FROM trader_profiles WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(preferences, '$.language') = 'English' ORDER BY trader_id DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM trader_profiles WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe'
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles WHERE trader_id IN (101, 105, 110)
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM trader_profiles WHERE trader_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, email FROM trader_profiles ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT trader_id, risk_tolerance, preferred_assets FROM trader_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT * FROM trader_preferences ORDER BY trader_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles WHERE trader_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM trader_profiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT trader_id, risk_tolerance, trading_strategy FROM trader_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Medium' ORDER BY trader_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles JOIN trader_preferences ON trader_profiles.trader_id = trader_preferences.trader_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name, email, risk_tolerance, trading_strategy FROM trader_profiles JOIN trader_preferences ON trader_profiles.trader_id = trader_preferences.trader_id WHERE trader_profiles.location = 'London';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM TraderProfiles WHERE trader_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM TraderProfiles WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM TraderPreferences WHERE preference_category = 'Stocks';
SELECT recommendation, confidence_level FROM TradingRecommendations WHERE trader_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM TraderProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TraderProfiles WHERE trader_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM TraderProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT trader_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM TraderPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'High';
SELECT recommendation_id, trader_id, recommendation, confidence_level FROM TradingRecommendations WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM TraderProfiles JOIN TraderPreferences ON TraderProfiles.trader_id = TraderPreferences.trader_id;
SELECT * FROM traders;
SELECT first_name, email FROM traders WHERE trader_id = 1;
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM traders ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT trader_id, date_of_birth, created_at FROM traders WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT email, phone_number FROM traders WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM traders WHERE trader_id = 1001;
SELECT trader_id, date_of_birth, created_at FROM traders ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT preferences.trader_id, risk_tolerance, investment_horizon, preferred_sectors FROM preferences INNER JOIN traders ON preferences.trader_id = traders.trader_id WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';

SELECT traders.first_name, notifications.notification_text, notifications.notification_date FROM notifications INNER JOIN traders ON notifications.trader_id = traders.trader_id WHERE notifications.is_read = FALSE ORDER BY notifications.notification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles;
SELECT name, age, email FROM trader_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM trading_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trader_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM trading_recommendations WHERE confidence_score > 0.8;
SELECT trader_id, time_period, returns, win_ratio FROM trader_performance WHERE returns > 5000;
SELECT * FROM trader_profiles;
SELECT id, name, age FROM trader_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM trader_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, trader_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM trading_recommendations WHERE confidence_score > 70 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT trader_id, trade_date, symbol, trade_type, trade_amount FROM trading_history WHERE trade_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
